newsitem.title: USA: GPU Q3 net shr falls to $0.29.
newsitem.headline: GPU Q3 net shr falls to $0.29.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)
NOTE: Three, nine and twelve month earnings for 1996 include a $74.5 million charge, or $0.62 per share, for voluntary enhanced retirement programs.

Three, nine and twelve months earnings for 1995 include a $104.9 million credit, or $0.91 per share, from the reversal of retirement costs previously written off. Partially offsetting the increase was a $8.4 million or $0.07 per share write-off for Three Mile Island - unit 2 monitored storage costs.
Excluding non-recurring items, earnings for third quarter would have been $110.3 million or $0.91 per share, compared to $137.8 million or $1.18 per share for the same 1995 period.
Full company name is GPU Inc.
